Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 11

Contact us:

Manager: Helen Hudson and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
11A Mutford Lindenette 1045 – 1055
11B Mutford Old Post Office 1100 – 1120
11C Mutford Village Hall 1125 – 1145
11D Carlton Colville Chestnut Crescent 1200 – 1220
11E Carlton Colville Rounces Lane 1225 – 1255
11F Pakefield Arbor Lane 1405 – 1505
11G Gisleham Solar Farm 1510 – 1530

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays:

2015: 28 January, 25 February, 24 March, 21 April, 19 May, 16 June, 14 July, 11 August, 8 September, 6 October, 3 November, 1 December, 29 December
